feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:09 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -9.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 1:33 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -9.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -13.1°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
